2154.subject: CART
2154.descrlong:
This course covers the basic anatomy of human and animal figures, and character design and performance, with an emphasis on  gesture, construction, continuity and expression to support the narrative structure of the film.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Prereq: CART 318)
